column1: #: description: Inclusive $\Upsilon$(1S) $R_{\rm AA}$ and Pb-Pb yields as a function of collision centrality. The transverse-momentum and rapidity ranges are $0<p_{\rm T}<15$ GeV/$c$ and $2.5<y<4$
column2: respectively. Statistical and systematic uncertainties are reported. A global systematic uncertainty of 7.7% (4.9%) affects all the $R_{\rm AA}$ (yield) values. (The yields are not normalized to the kinematic intervals).

column1: #: keyword reactions: Pb Pb --> UPSI(1S) X

column4: Pb Pb --> UPSI(1S) < MU+ MU- > X
